Browse the source code of codebrowser/source/externals/clhep/include/CLHEP/Geometry/Normal3D.h

1// -*- C++ -*-
2// ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
3//
4// This file is a part of the CLHEP - a Class Library for High Energy Physics.
5//
6// History:
7// 09.09.96 E.Chernyaev - initial version
8// 12.06.01 E.Chernyaev - CLHEP-1.7: introduction of BasicVector3D to decouple
9// the functionality from CLHEP::Hep3Vector
10// 01.04.03 E.Chernyaev - CLHEP-1.9: template version
11//
12
13#ifndef HEP_NORMAL3D_H
14#define HEP_NORMAL3D_H
15
16#include <iosfwd>
17#include "CLHEP/Vector/ThreeVector.h"
18#include "CLHEP/Geometry/BasicVector3D.h"
19
20namespace HepGeom {
21
22 class Transform3D;
23
24 /**
25 * Geometrical 3D Normal.
26 * This is just a declaration of the class needed to define
27 * specializations Normal3D<float> and Normal3D<double>.
28 *
29 * @ingroup geometry
30 * @author Evgeni Chernyaev <Evgueni.Tcherniaev@cern.ch>
31 */
32 template<class T>
33 class Normal3D : public BasicVector3D<T> {};
34
35 /**
36 * Geometrical 3D Normal with components of float type.
37 *
38 * @author Evgeni Chernyaev <Evgueni.Tcherniaev@cern.ch>
39 * @ingroup geometry
40 */
41 template<>
42 class Normal3D<float> : public BasicVector3D<float> {
43 public:
44 /**
45 * Default constructor. */
46 Normal3D() {}
47
48 /**
49 * Constructor from three numbers. */
50 Normal3D(float x1, float y1, float z1) : BasicVector3D<float>(x1,y1,z1) {}
51
52 /**
53 * Constructor from array of floats. */
54 explicit Normal3D(const float * a)
55 : BasicVector3D<float>(a[0],a[1],a[2]) {}
56
57 /**
58 * Copy constructor. */
59 Normal3D(const Normal3D<float> & v) : BasicVector3D<float>(v) {}
60
61 /**
62 * Constructor from BasicVector3D<float>. */
63 Normal3D(const BasicVector3D<float> & v) : BasicVector3D<float>(v) {}
64
65 /**
66 * Destructor. */
67 ~Normal3D() {}
68
69 /**
70 * Assignment. */
71 Normal3D<float> & operator=(const Normal3D<float> & v) {
72 set(v.x(),v.y(),v.z()); return *this;
73 }
74
75 /**
76 * Assignment from BasicVector3D<float>. */
77 Normal3D<float> & operator=(const BasicVector3D<float> & v) {
78 set(v.x(),v.y(),v.z()); return *this;
79 }
80
81 /**
82 * Transformation by Transform3D. */
83 Normal3D<float> & transform(const Transform3D & m);
84 };
85
86 /**
87 * Transformation of Normal<float> by Transform3D.
88 * @relates Normal3D
89 */
90 Normal3D<float>
91 operator*(const Transform3D & m, const Normal3D<float> & n);
92
93 /**
94 * Geometrical 3D Normal with components of double type.
95 *
96 * @author Evgeni Chernyaev <Evgueni.Tcherniaev@cern.ch>
97 * @ingroup geometry
98 */
99 template<>
100 class Normal3D<double> : public BasicVector3D<double> {
101 public:
102 /**
103 * Default constructor. */
104 Normal3D() {}
105
106 /**
107 * Constructor from three numbers. */
108 Normal3D(double x1, double y1, double z1) : BasicVector3D<double>(x1,y1,z1) {}
109
110 /**
111 * Constructor from array of floats. */
112 explicit Normal3D(const float * a)
113 : BasicVector3D<double>(a[0],a[1],a[2]) {}
114
115 /**
116 * Constructor from array of doubles. */
117 explicit Normal3D(const double * a)
118 : BasicVector3D<double>(a[0],a[1],a[2]) {}
119
120 /**
121 * Copy constructor. */
122 Normal3D(const Normal3D<double> & v) : BasicVector3D<double>(v) {}
123
124 /**
125 * Constructor from BasicVector3D<float>. */
126 Normal3D(const BasicVector3D<float> & v) : BasicVector3D<double>(v) {}
127
128 /**
129 * Constructor from BasicVector3D<double>. */
130 Normal3D(const BasicVector3D<double> & v) : BasicVector3D<double>(v) {}
131
132 /**
133 * Destructor. */
134 ~Normal3D() {}
135
136 /**
137 * Constructor from CLHEP::Hep3Vector.
138 * This constructor is needed only for backward compatibility and
139 * in principle should be absent.
140 */
141 Normal3D(const CLHEP::Hep3Vector & v)
142 : BasicVector3D<double>(v.x(),v.y(),v.z()) {}
143
144 /**
145 * Conversion (cast) to CLHEP::Hep3Vector.
146 * This operator is needed only for backward compatibility and
147 * in principle should not exit.
148 */
149 operator CLHEP::Hep3Vector () const { return CLHEP::Hep3Vector(x(),y(),z()); }
150
151 /**
152 * Assignment. */
153 Normal3D<double> & operator=(const Normal3D<double> & v) {
154 set(v.x(),v.y(),v.z()); return *this;
155 }
156
157 /**
158 * Assignment from BasicVector3D<float>. */
159 Normal3D<double> & operator=(const BasicVector3D<float> & v) {
160 set(v.x(),v.y(),v.z()); return *this;
161 }
162
163 /**
164 * Assignment from BasicVector3D<double>. */
165 Normal3D<double> & operator=(const BasicVector3D<double> & v) {
166 set(v.x(),v.y(),v.z()); return *this;
167 }
168
169 /**
170 * Transformation by Transform3D. */
171 Normal3D<double> & transform(const Transform3D & m);
172 };
173
174 /**
175 * Transformation of Normal<double> by Transform3D.
176 * @relates Normal3D
177 */
178 Normal3D<double>
179 operator*(const Transform3D & m, const Normal3D<double> & n);
180
181} /* namespace HepGeom */
182
183#endif /* HEP_NORMAL3D_H */
184
